sentences.english: All the time they agonize and pray.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直在忍受苦痛并且祈祷。

sentences.english: “Life is short, dull, full of pain, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: “生命短暂又无趣，而且充满苦痛，”他说。

sentences.english: To know the pain of too much  tenderness.
sentences.chinese: 明了过多的温柔所带来的苦痛。

sentences.english: It keepsdistressing me and makes me try to think about myself.
sentences.chinese: 我因此也时时煞了苦痛，努力的要想到我自己。

sentences.english: But day doth daily draw my sorrows longer.
sentences.chinese: 但天天白天尽拖长我的苦痛。

sentences.english: The suffering doctrine is the theory basis of life speculation of Wang Guowei.
sentences.chinese: “苦痛”说是王国维人生思辨的理论基点。

sentences.english: I command you to accuse yourselves, and to declare the truth, amidst the tearing of your flesh, and the dislocation of your bones.
sentences.chinese: 我命令你们抛弃自己，在裂肉断骨的苦痛中坚持真相。

sentences.english: You avoid and infarction, stroke and many other torments.
sentences.chinese: 还可以避免梗死，中风以及其他很多苦痛。

sentences.english: Your pain is the breaking ofthe shell that encloses your understanding.
sentences.chinese: 你的苦痛是你那包裹知识的皮壳的破裂。

sentences.english: The last little act of beneficence soothed Bonhag's lacerated soul a little .
sentences.chinese: 这最后的小恩惠略微缓和了些邦哈苦痛的灵魂。

sentences.english: At one point, my profound pain actually made my psychiatrist cry.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，我深刻的苦痛居然把我的心理医生都弄哭了。

sentences.english: The Buddha once claimed that desire creates suffering.
sentences.chinese: 佛陀曾说，苦痛是在不断的渴求中诞生的。

sentences.english: It is the pang of separation that spreads throughout the world and gives birth to shapes innumerable in the infinites sky.
sentences.chinese: 分离的苦痛弥漫时间，在无尽的天际里有无数种体现。

sentences.english: The solution, in Buddhism, is to cease desiring things and therefore your suffering will end.
sentences.chinese: 在佛教中，苦痛唯一的救赎，就是放弃欲望。

sentences.english: If you will bear all this, I will help you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能忍受得了这些苦痛的话，我就可以帮助你。

sentences.english: It does not offer an escape for the intellectual ailment.
sentences.chinese: 它无法为理智上的苦痛提供逃避之法。
